skillTree.localised_description: Smaller than their powerful Bretonnian equivalents, barding protects Imperial warhorses from blows that would otherwise fell these proud beasts.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.

skillTree.localised_description: With its powerful clockwork mechanism, this bucking equine contraption can demolish most things that suffer the impact of being in its rider’s path.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.

skillTree.localised_description: Arrows, cannonballs and more esoteric munitions are needed in endless supply on the battlefield.
Those who bear the Mark of Hysh are practitioners of the magical Lore of Light, and the bane of Chaos, for they are able to control and manipulate the White Wind of Magic.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: If it can be shot at the foe, this one knows everything apposite about its design and use.

target_if: Unit is Artillery or a War Machine

skillTree.localised_description: Hills, forest, desert – you name it, those clever boys from the Empire have got it covered.

effects.description:
Attribute: Strider for Chariot and War Machine units
	(own army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Chariot and War Machine units
	(own army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
Working with gunpowder takes a lot of patience – one wrong move and you might lose your trigger finger... or worse!
Although always a force to be reckoned with, this generally quiet, unassuming man of learning can turn on the head of a coin into an expert killer.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: An Engineer can create machines powerful enough to counter anything the foe can throw at them. Well, that's the theory anyway…

effects.description: Basic ammunition gains increased range and armour-piercing missile damage
Gains a short range explosive damage ammunition switch

skillTree.localised_description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Professional soldiery means never running out of ammo at the crucial moment.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
What use armour, or even magical defences, against such powerful ordnance?
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Death is always just a shot away.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: Prototype Field Coat Mark XXIV is the future of projectile-proof battle wear. Unlike Mark XXIII, this version doesn’t catch fire when struck!

item_set.name: Gunnery School Gadgets
item_set.description: Ingenuity, experimentation and experience... and no small measure of blind luck!

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -20% for Gunnery units
	(own army)

items.colour_text: "That jittery little man who sold me this strange green powder wasnt lying... it really is incredible!"

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random
Chance of unit taking damage instead of gaining missile strength and reload bonuses

item_set.name: Gunnery School Gadgets
item_set.description: Ingenuity, experimentation and experience... and no small measure of blind luck!

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -20% for Gunnery units
	(own army)

items.colour_text: "You put enough lenses in a scope and you can probably even see the surface of the Twin-Tailed Comet itself!"

effects.description: In battles, enemy units in forests are revealed regardless of distance

item_set.name: Gunnery School Gadgets
item_set.description: Ingenuity, experimentation and experience... and no small measure of blind luck!

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -20% for Gunnery units
	(own army)

items.colour_text: This compound of highly volatile powder ignites with the slightest jostle – perfectly suitable for the battlefield if you can get it there unexploded!

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description:
Explosive missile damage +10% 
	(all units in army)

Missile Explosion Radius: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Don't be stingy with your bullets if you're not sure they're really *dead* dead.
Extra layers of flame retardant material are a sensible precaution for a volatile job.
The groaning of metal and booming of artillery is distracting to say the least, but to some it sounds like... home.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Empire Artillery and War Machine units
	(Hero's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Empire Artillery and War Machine units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Innovation is the first step to success; the rest requires surviving test-cases.
By wooden frame and solid stone, and more than a modicum of skills, towering structures shall rise up out of the earth.

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for Military Support buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -15% for Military Support buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Stand back and hit 'em from afar… The fools will never see it coming!"

effects.description:
Range: +15% for Gunnery Infantry and Gunnery Cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Those walls are solid and sturdy, to be sure. I'll bring 'em down all the same."

effects.description: Additional wall breaches caused when using the Damage Walls action

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Such an ugly scar is always memorable.
